summary: A collection of command‑line utilities that acquire, convert, and package text and audio corpora into the format required for training token‑classification models (punctuation and capitalization) in the NeMo framework. The tools handle downloading public datasets, extracting and normalizing transcriptions, converting IOB annotations, building label vocabularies, validating metadata, and producing efficient tarred datasets with optional parallel processing.
business_intent: Simplify and accelerate the preparation of high‑quality training data for NLP token‑classification models, enabling developers to quickly obtain and preprocess corpora for punctuation and capitalization tasks without manual data engineering.
